Summary: Missing time. Close encounter. Letting me know they are always listening.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Wyoming
There were no other sightings in Wyoming on or around June 1st 1999
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi have written other places like this one and never received any responses so i don't expect on from you either but ill try. my first memory of them visiting me is when i was 5. i was outside on the babysitters porch dangling my feet over the edge of the porch looking around. it was the summer. and like always something told me to look in my mind and i looked down the street and at thee end of the street over top of mr ks party store was an air craft approximately 300 to 500 ft in diameter coming down the road toward me. no sound just very slowly coming straight down the road. i know they were coming for me. anyway my baby sitter was sitting behind me4 in folding chair just sitting and as i stared at it i pointed up at it coming down the road and said to jeff( can you see it) then my next memory i have is waking up in a bed in his house. there is quite a bit of missing time there and cant recall any of it until im awake the next morning. then there was the summer of very strange things that were going on every day. i believe it was when i was 18 or 19, but it lasted for about 4 months. during this time i had 23 very close encounters one within 20ft including 4 other witnesses and myself then 2 witnesses then myself. this summer i was followed every day in broad daylight by a triangular shaped aircraft. long story short it has been over 10 years since ive heard the voice tell me to look up and see them until recently. for the past 2.5 months or longer there are 2 sometimes 3 extraterrestrial aircraft the are always outside my house. now i live i live in wyoming mi and i also have a girlfriend who lives in portage mi, and there are two sets of them in both places because i have recorded them in both places and have been observed my my girlfriend in portage at the same time i was observing the behind my house in wyoming. if i ask them to do specific things in my head like move to the left they will. i have 23 minutes of them on digital video and have pictures of them on my computer and there pretty awesome if you ask me. when i was younger they wouldent let me get video of them but now they don't care if i take pictures or get video or bring people to see them. every night they are there. its easier to watch them when im out in the country here in portage. i can for sure relate 3 different events with me and my girlfriend daughter her boyfriend and my self. definite abductions in 2 of them and one event where an invisible doorway had been opened to another world not our own as the boy walked through he saw people walking around like humans walk around here only these people were different in appearance and the weird thing is is that the people saw him and they were weird ed out by the fact that he was human \he looked different then they did and his sudden appearance right in front of them once he looked around and realized where he was wasn't right he started walking backwards then all of a sudden he was back in our world. lots of other stuff but im tired of typing so if you would like to get a hold of me of it least point me toward a good hypnotherapist in my area that don't cost to much let me know. now out of the 3 pictures i gave you the spectrum of light has been altered only so you can see the true outline of the craft. im using picassa to enhance the pictures and you will want to zoom in the really see what your looking at. hope to here from you, mike
Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, Over 1 Mile
